testcase.name: Add New Customer
testcase.system-out: Given User launch chrome broswer............................................passed When User open URL as "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"............passed And User enter Email id as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"....passed And user clicked on Login buttton...........................................passed Then page title should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration"..........passed When User clicked on Customers Menu.........................................passed And Clicked on Customers Menu Item..........................................passed And Clicked on Add new button...............................................passed Then User can view Add new customer page....................................passed When User enter customer info...............................................passed And Clicked on save button..................................................passed Then user can view message "The new customer has been added successfully."..passed And user close the browser..................................................passed

testcase.name: Login with Valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User launch chrome broswer............................................passed When User open URL as "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"............passed And User enter Email id as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"....passed And user clicked on Login buttton...........................................passed Then page title should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration"..........passed When user click on logout button............................................passed Then page title should be "Your store. Login"...............................passed And user close the browser..................................................passed
